column1: ‘ Right, let's be having you then,’ he said, and proceeded to lead his recruits — carryying everything from battered suitcases to brown paper parcels — through the streets of Edinburgh at the double, only to be sure that the locals didn't realise just how undisciplined this rabble really was.
